dcterms:description: ROCStories is a corpus of short stories containing 98,162 commonsense stories, each with exactly five sentences and an average word count of 50. The dataset is rich with causal and temporal relations among events, making it useful for learning narrative structure and organizing sentences in a coherent manner.
dcterms:title: ROCStories
